post.body: I guess I work the opposite way. When I have an idea, I finish that one idea and I do it quickly so I can move on 2 the next.
Oh..I'm not saying do things out of fear or rush projects that need more time. Just saying GO FOR IT as soon as u can.
I guess...It's your career. You know what's best. Do you.
why wait? What's stopping you? Tomorrow isn't promised. Today is what matters.
I'm looking for another gig. You've seen my published work. Let me know.
Gold is valuable becaue we all decided to AGREE that it is. We as a people, decide what is valuable by a mutual decision 2 believe.
u crazy! A director just pulls it all together, like the producer. He organizes the artists to do what he envisions.
We have 4 minutes. What's happening now?
What? man.. I'm tired of this shit! Keep trying. I'm calling the fucking studio manager now...
LOL! yes, money and cash are the same things! LOL never thought about it like that. I guess they'r saying they want DOUBLE!
Mixing and scratching is the name of the game! LOL!
friend...its almost over. hold on...
Yay! CEO! CEO! CEO! ~smile~
wearing make up makes me feel happy. Even when it goes away, the process of applying did the trick. wear yr make up.
Keep looking...One day you're gonna open your eyes and It's gonna be true. I love u girl!
CONGRATS Ruby on finishing your MS! I love MUVIE (@rumopo)
~waking up~ Hey...I had the most wonderful dream last nite. I'm gonna blog about it..BRB
"We're Top Flight Security of the WORLD, Craig!" LMAO!
"Group hug Nigga!" LOL!
watching Friday after Next. This movie makes me happy.
on the phone with my BFF she's making me laugh in order to forget my radio station troubles...Appreciate it.
im headed back home....
fuck it! like...what the fuck...
What the fuck is up with this bootleg ass radio station? My sis says its not streaming AGAIN. Damn am I the only one serious about my show?
My show starts in 15 minutes. Listen in while you twitter away! http://www.barry.edu/radiostation/
getting ready to head to the studio for my show tonight...
Wait..I'm not supposed to be working today...I can't help it. ~sigh~
I really need to find an African American website interested in showcasing my presentation. Can u refer? http://www.vimeo.com/2496038
Wow! I just got my first payment from my eBook sales! What a great surprise! Thanks everyone who supported my creativity.
Why do ppl continuously call me Erika? That's not my name. My name has a BIG 'OL syllable in front of the Erika... R u just lazy?
One of my wishes for 2008 was..to win a contest! I got it! Don't give up on this year folks! u still have time to make yr wishes come true.
Just posted about my Monday night treat... http://tinyurl.com/64fmlr
Yay! I won a contest! Free reiki treatment! Thanks @reikimoon ~cheering~
I am having a great time so far...Its a beautiful day here in north central florida...
I decided that...I'm on vacation right now and I'm not gonna do anything but goof off. I give myself permission to do nothing.
WHy does listening to Xmas music always make me cry? And I feel lonely when I hear it too. Why is that?
I love everybody that I'm following. Thanks for letting me share in your life. You're a part of mine too. ~hugs~
Isn't it interesting how u can tell the same story to 2 diff friends and get completely different reactions? amazes me every time...
i love my friend! @tprince i dont know what i'd do without her...
Listening to the Xmas Mixtape over at Mixtress.com http://tinyurl.com/5848oe
